name: White Rocks Defense
description:
It could've been a rhythm game...

White Rocks Defense Arcade six-directional shooter Web version is Chromium only, sorry about that, Godot 4 issues

It's winter now, and what could possibly be more exciting than making snowmen (snowmans? snowpeople?)

And for that reason, there is a snowman building tournament being held in Gensokyo! Of course, fairies are still pranking anyone they see, so you have to fight for safety of your precious creations (and victory)!

Help Letty Whiterock to defend her snowmen from annoying Cirnos! Why not one Cirno? Find that out by yourself!

Controls:
  • Strike snowballs — buttons on snowmen (W/A/S//UP/RIGHT/DOWN on keyboard, UP/LEFT/DOWN//Y/B/A on gamepad)
  • Heal Mode — hold Space/RT: throw snowballs at snowman twice to fix it!
Credits:

Duck and referee whistle: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com

Godot Engine: https://godotengine.org

Everything else: me
